attributes.action: Keep June 27th as Veterans day & Not re-name it Armed Forces Day as this cuts out all Civilian Veterans who also gave Their Lives in service to their country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please return June 27th to "Veterans Day" there is no logical reason to change it, As It covers All our Veterans, both Armed Forces and Civilians. If you change it, You once again cut out the "Fourth Service The British Merchant Navy" Who lost 32,000 + Men & Women in WW11 alone. Sure have an Armed forces day but not June 27th, I and my members will support that all the way. Please support my Petition and thank you all in anticipation.
 John D Meadowcroft.
attributes.creator_name: Mr John  Meadowcroft M N Ret
